description: The `v-data-iterator` component is used for displaying arbitrary data, and shares a majority of its functionality with the `v-data-table` component.

props.expanded: Array of expanded items. Can be bound to external variable using **v-model:expanded**.
props.footerProps: See the [`v-data-footer`](/api/v-data-footer) API for more information.
props.groupBy: Configures attributes (and sort order) to group items together.
props.initialSortOrder: Specifies the initial sort order when an **toggleSort** is called for unsorted property.
props.itemKey: The property on each item that is used as a unique key.
props.itemsPerPage: Changes how many items per page should be visible. Can be bound to external variable using **v-model:itemsPerPage**.. Setting this prop to `-1` will display all items on the page.
props.loading: If `true` and no items are provided, then a loading text will be shown.
props.loadingText: Text shown when `loading` is true and no items are provided.
props.locale: Sets the locale used for sorting. This is passed into [`Intl.Collator()`](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Intl/Collator/Collator) in the default `customSort` function.
props.mobileBreakpoint: Used to set when to toggle between regular table and mobile view.
props.noResultsText: Text shown when `search` prop is used and there are no results.
props.search: Text input used to filter items.
props.selectableKey: The property on each item that is used to determine if it is selectable or not.
props.serverItemsLength: Used only when data is provided by a server. Should be set to the total amount of items available on server so that pagination works correctly.
props.singleExpand: Changes expansion mode to single expand.
props.singleSelect: Changes selection mode to single select.

slots.default: The default slot. Use this to render your items.
slots.footer.page-text: This slot is forwarded to the default footer. See the [`v-data-footer`](/api/v-data-footer) API for more information.
slots.footer: Defines a footer below the items.
slots.header: Defines a header above the items.
slots.loading: Defines content for when `loading` is true and no items are provided.
slots.no-data: Defines content for when no items are provided.
slots.no-results: Defines content for when `search` is provided but no results are found.

events.update:currentItems: Emits with the items currently being displayed.
events.update:expanded: Emits when the **expanded** items are updated.
events.update:groupBy: Emits when the **group-by** prop is updated.
events.update:itemsPerPage: Emits when the **items-per-page** prop is updated.
events.update:options: Emits when pagination related properties (page, itemsPerPage, sortBy, groupBy, search) is updated.
events.update:page: Emits when the **page** prop is updated.
events.update:sortBy: Emits when the **sortBy** prop is updated.
